Title: Psycho
Plot: Phoenix office worker Marion Crane is fed up with the way life has treated her. She has to meet her lover Sam in lunch breaks, and they cannot get married because Sam has to give most of his money away in alimony. One Friday, Marion is trusted to bank forty thousand dollars by her employer. Seeing the opportunity to take the money and start a new life, Marion leaves town and heads towards Sam's California store. Tired after the long drive and caught in a storm, she gets off the main highway and pulls into the Bates Motel. The motel is managed by a quiet young man called Norman who seems to be dominated by his mother.
Awards: Top Rated Movies #41 | Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 10 nominations.
Stars: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, John Gavin
Tagline: The picture you MUST see from the beginning... Or not at all!... For no one will be seated after the start of... Alfred Hitchcock's greatest shocker Psycho.

Similars.Title: Rear Window
Similars.Plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
Similars.Stars: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey

Similars.Title: Vertigo
Similars.Plot: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.
Similars.Stars: James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes

Similars.Title: The Shining
Similars.Plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.
Similars.Stars: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd

Similars.Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Similars.Plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
Similars.Stars: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney

Similars.Title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Similars.FullTitle: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975)
Similars.Plot: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.
Similars.Stars: Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman

Similars.Title: Casablanca
Similars.Plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.
Similars.Stars: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid

Similars.Title: Psycho II
Similars.Plot: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.
Similars.Stars: Anthony Perkins, Vera Miles, Meg Tilly

Similars.Title: A Clockwork Orange
Similars.Plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.
Similars.Stars: Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates

Similars.Title: Psycho III
Similars.Plot: Norman Bates falls in love with a fallen nun who stays at the Bates Motel alongside a drifter and a curious reporter. Meanwhile, "Mother" is still watching.
Similars.Stars: Anthony Perkins, Diana Scarwid, Jeff Fahey

Similars.Title: North by Northwest
Similars.Plot: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.
Similars.Stars: Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason

Similars.Title: 12 Angry Men
Similars.Plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
Similars.Stars: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam

Similars.Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Similars.FullTitle: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly (1966)
Similars.Plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
Similars.Stars: Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef
